events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position, showing relevant skills in devops and backend development.
The application was categorised under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as software, engineer, and devops found in the resume and cover letter.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to oversee the candidateâ€™s application and the subsequent recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well, with the candidate demonstrating strong knowledge of software development principles and relevant devops tools.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to the interview invitation, expressing eagerness to participate in the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for June 10th at 10 AM UTC, focusing on backend system design and devops automation tasks.
